snippet.title: RABBIT HORROR SHOW by -X-ScornGames - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
#xx696 #xscorngames #gameguru
Get it here here: https://xx696.itch.io/rhs01
X-ScornGames presents...
 Rabbit Horror Show
One would never believe that something as extraordinary as this could happen to oneself, but fate had an unusual twist in store for me. Yesterday, as the dark storm clouds gathered ominously in the sky, a bolt of lightning, like a celestial spear, found its target, and that target was me. The force of nature's wrath struck me with a ferocity that defied reason. Incredibly, I did not succumb to death's cold embrace, nor did I bear any visible wounds. It was as if the universe had chosen me for a different fate, one that would lead me to a realm beyond imagination.

As consciousness slowly returned, I found myself in an otherworldly landscape, a place that seemed to exist beyond the confines of time and space. Strange hues painted the sky, and ethereal wisps of mist danced like specters in the air. Yet, this surreal beauty was accompanied by an unsettling sense of foreboding. As I ventured cautiously through this peculiar realm, my heart pounded with both wonder and fear. It was then that I encountered them - the denizens of this enigmatic world - the mad rabbits. Their eyes burned a sinister crimson, their fur bristled with malevolence, and their movements were swift, almost unnaturally so.

These were no ordinary creatures; they were the embodiment of nightmares, a nightmarish creation that belonged to a darker realm. Their bloodcurdling screams echoed through the eerie landscape, and I knew I had stumbled upon something beyond the boundaries of our known reality. Yet, in this perilous predicament, fate had provided me with an unexpected advantage. Right beside the spot where I had awakened, an enigmatic collection of futuristic weapons lay hidden, waiting for someone to wield their power. As I gazed upon this extraordinary arsenal, I understood that I held the key to my survival. Determination surged within me, fueling my courage to stand against the madness that surrounded me. With the strange, yet powerful weapons in hand, I prepared to face the demonic onslaught of these unholy rabbits.

Now, the responsibility lay on my shoulders, and the fate of both worlds hung in the balance. The lines between reality and illusion blurred, as I embraced the challenge that destiny had laid at my feet. Will you take up the mantle of courage and guide my hand in this battle of surreal proportions?


Features:
fight evil, but extremely cute rabbits  
explore two unique, yet abstract locations 
eight futuristic weapons 
self-healing ability
last chance system [gain back health, when it drops below 35]
blood-boiling soundtrack
settings to customize gaming experience 
installer
no-drm
Created for the no-unity game jam at the end of september 2023.

Buy the official RHS  Artwork Collection!: https://ko-fi.com/s/f2ffeae549
Contact:
https://westream.at/xx696/

https://xx696.itch.io

https://www.indiedb.com/company/xx696

https://ko-fi.com/xxxx696

https://www.youtube.com/@DrFaustrecht

https://www.twitch.tv/xx696

https://discord.gg/YCbvSQ55Qy
